text: waldhyn 'iidha airtakabuu dhnbana kbyrana 'aw zalamuu 'anfusahum biairtikab ma dwnh, dhukiruu waead allah wweydh fljau 'iilaa rabihim taybyn, yatlubun minh 'an yughfar lahum dhnwbhm, wahum muqinun 'anah la yaghfir aldhunub 'iilaa allh, fahum ldhlk la yuqimun ealaa mesyt, wahum yaelamun 'anahum 'iina tabuu taab allah elyhm
